ROUTE MANAGER

SUMMARY

To obtaining a position in a company that will allow me to better use my skills and knowledge to advance the performance and profitability of that company.
Goal oriented, self-motivated with twenty years of experience as a Supervisor/Manager of personnel, products, and budgets.
Driven to tackle projects that advance the organization and build collaboration/teamwork among peers and subordinates.
Leader of the consistently, number one ranked office for the MasTec Money sales program.
Major strengthens include demonstrated track record of honesty, integrity, and loyalty; sound leadership; excellent communication skills; strong team player; advocate of self-efficacy; attention to detail; highly organized; proficient planner.
Highlights
Operations management Inventory control Supervision and training Procedure development Analytical Team building Multi-site operations Staff retention
Sound judgment Calm under pressure Relationship building Systems implementation Troubleshooting and problem solving Dedicated Client relationships Contract management

Leadership

<JD_START>
Job Title: Women's Apparel Designer

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Job title: Women's Apparel Designer

Contract type:

Location: New York

Discipline:

Remote: No

Salary: $85,000/year - $95,000/year

Reference: 463631

Contact name: Sarah Stanley

Job Description

Designer, Women's Wovens and Knits

Client Overview: 

Our client is a celebrated authority in the design and manufacturing of women's clothing. The company is known for its popular brands which are featured in major retailers including Nordstrom, Bloomingdales, Macy’s, Urban Outfitters, and more.

Designer Overview:

As the Apparel Designer, you will be responsible for supporting the Design Director by designing brand right collections to reflect season trends and account needs.

Designer Responsibilities:


 Research the market and put together market/trend research on new silhouettes,


color, and fabrication.


 Work closely with the Design Directors to execute their brand vision Track and organize development samples by following up with factories to ensure


samples are received on time.


 Design, sketch with accurate specifications for fit, construction, fabrication, print, and


color.


 Ensures adherence to the Seasonal Time and Action calendar Source and select the new seasonal fabrics and trims Work closely with suppliers abroad to ensure good execution of design tech packs


and samples


 Maintain the fabric, trim and color library - Ensure fabric library is up to date for


seasonal inspiration and archived fabrics

The ideal candidate will possess the following skills:


 Possess strong knowledge of garment construction. Experience in Sweaters Thorough knowledge of silhouettes, fabrication, construction techniques, and trim Ability to design around concept direction Strong sketching and fast tech packing abilities


Designer Qualifications:


 Level of education: Bachelor's degree in fashion design Work experience: 5+ years design experience- PRIVATE LABEL EXPERIENCE REQUIRED, OFF PRICE EXPERIENCE PREFERRED Creativity and enthusiasm for fashion Strong organizational skills Ability to multitask, prioritize workloads and handle the pressure of a fast-paced


environment


 Team player with a can-do attitude Proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator, Excel and all other Microsoft Office Applications

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
